original_title: นักร้องนักเลง
overview: The story of the famous luk thung singer "Saiyan Sanya" who has to face the dark influence of "Mr. Suriyan" (Wittaya Sukdamrong) who intends to take his life many times But in the end, Sayan had to suffer the most when "Duean" (Nantida Kaewbuasai), the girl he loved, was forced to marry "Pinit" (Payak Ramwatin). being watched for life all the time
title: Gangster Singer
